verses.kjv: I will bless the LORD at all times: his praise shall continually be in my mouth.
verses.ct: I will praise the LORD at every moment; words of thanks to him will always be on my lips.

verses.kjv: My soul shall make her boast in the LORD: the humble shall hear thereof, and be glad.
verses.ct: My soul will find its pride in the LORD; those who are humble will hear this and be filled with joy.

verses.kjv: O magnify the LORD with me, and let us exalt his name together.
verses.ct: Declare the greatness of the LORD with me — let's lift up his name together.

verses.kjv: I sought the LORD, and he heard me, and delivered me from all my fears.
verses.ct: I called out to the LORD, and he answered me, and he rescued me from everything I was afraid of.

verses.kjv: They looked unto him, and were lightened: and their faces were not ashamed.
verses.ct: Those who turned to him were filled with light, and their faces were never covered with shame.

verses.kjv: This poor man cried, and the LORD heard him, and saved him out of all his troubles.
verses.ct: This suffering man called out, and the LORD heard him and saved him from all his troubles.

verses.kjv: The angel of the LORD encampeth round about them that fear him, and delivereth them.
verses.ct: The angel of the LORD sets up camp around those who deeply revere him, and he rescues them.

verses.kjv: O taste and see that the LORD is good: blessed is the man that trusteth in him.
verses.ct: Experience for yourself and discover that the LORD is good — how happy is the person who puts their trust in him.

verses.kjv: O fear the LORD, ye his saints: for there is no want to them that fear him.
verses.ct: Be wholeheartedly dedicated to the LORD, you who belong to him, because those who deeply revere him lack nothing.

verses.kjv: The young lions do lack, and suffer hunger: but they that seek the LORD shall not want any good thing.
verses.ct: Even young lions go without and become hungry, but those who seek the LORD will never be without anything good.

verses.kjv: Come, ye children, hearken unto me: I will teach you the fear of the LORD.
verses.ct: Come here, children, and listen to me — I will teach you what wholehearted dedication to the LORD means.

verses.kjv: What man is he that desireth life, and loveth many days, that he may see good?
verses.ct: Who among you wants to truly live and loves having long days so you can enjoy what is good?

verses.kjv: Keep thy tongue from evil, and thy lips from speaking guile.
verses.ct: Guard your tongue from saying harmful things, and keep your lips from speaking lies.

verses.kjv: Depart from evil, and do good; seek peace, and pursue it.
verses.ct: Turn away from evil and do what is right; search for peace and chase after it.

verses.kjv: The eyes of the LORD are upon the righteous, and his ears are open unto their cry.
verses.ct: The LORD watches over those who do right, and his ears are open to their cries for help.

verses.kjv: The face of the LORD is against them that do evil, to cut off the remembrance of them from the earth.
verses.ct: The LORD opposes those who practice evil, wiping out any memory of them from the earth.

verses.kjv: The righteous cry, and the LORD heareth, and delivereth them out of all their troubles.
verses.ct: When righteous people cry out, the LORD hears them and rescues them from all their troubles.

verses.kjv: The LORD is nigh unto them that are of a broken heart; and saveth such as be of a contrite spirit.
verses.ct: The LORD is near to those whose hearts are broken, and he saves those whose spirits are crushed.

verses.kjv: Many are the afflictions of the righteous: but the LORD delivereth him out of them all.
verses.ct: A righteous person may face many hardships, but the LORD rescues them from every single one.

verses.kjv: He keepeth all his bones: not one of them is broken.
verses.ct: He protects all of their bones — not even 1 of them is broken.

verses.kjv: Evil shall slay the wicked: and they that hate the righteous shall be desolate.
verses.ct: Evil itself will kill the wicked, and those who hate the righteous will be condemned.

verses.kjv: The LORD redeemeth the soul of his servants: and none of them that trust in him shall be desolate.
verses.ct: The LORD redeems the soul of his servants, and no one who trusts in him will be condemned.
